Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities Very Good knowledge in C/C++ and object-oriented programming.Design, implementation, debug, test and documentation of embedded software.Several years (8+) of experience in software design and implementation.Knowledge of the MISRA Standards and static/dynamic code analysis.Experience with debuggers is desirable (e.g. Lauterbach)Independent, structured and solution-oriented working methodExperience with tools such as DOORS, IMS is desirableKnowledge of Continuous Integration and Verification and apply agile ways of working (Scrum, Kanban) with state-of-the-art tools like Jenkins, GIT, Gerrit, JIRA and GTest is requiredKnowledge of Design PatternsKnowledge of Image processing/Computer vision (preferred skills)
